info.name: Constituency Development Hub API v2
info.description: Complete API documentation for the Constituency Development Hub. Includes Authentication, User Management, Issue Tracking, CMS, and Role-based workflows.

item.name: 1. Authentication
item.description: User authentication endpoints including login, registration, password management, and email verification.

request.description: Register a new user account. Role can be: attendee, organizer, web_admin, officer, agent, task_force
Login with email and password. Returns JWT access token and refresh token.
Get a new access token using a refresh token.
Get the current authenticated user's profile.
Change the current user's password. Requires authentication.
Request a password reset email.

response.name: Success

request.description: Reset password using token from email.
Verify email address using token from email.
Resend email verification link.
Logout and invalidate refresh token.
Get reports assigned to the logged-in officer. Requires officer role.
Get agents supervised by this officer.
List all officers. Requires web_admin role.
